By jabbing his [[jō]] into an [[earth]]en surface, Iwabee can collect rocks around it, making it various melee weapons such as a hammer or spear. In addition to increasing the weight and strength of the blows from his weapon, the user can also strike the ground, creating a long-reaching shockwave.
